message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers incredible value, even at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $15,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this still reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm glad we're closer. I would like to propose $12,500 as a fair price for the product.
